name: PromoteToDistributionGroup
friendlyName: Promote Release to App Center Distribution Group
description: Promote Release to App Center Distribution Group Based on Version Number
author: Teja Vejendla

inputs.name: ServerEndpoint
inputs.label: App Center service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service connection for Visual Studio App Center. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service connection.

inputs.name: Version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Build Number or Version Number of the App

inputs.name: GroupName
inputs.label: Distribution Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Distribution Group Name in App Center

inputs.name: AppName
inputs.label: App Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The app name is in the format of {username}/{app_identifier}. If you are using orgs, the app name is of the format {orgname}/{app_identifier}.
